introduction: CatsOnChain is the first 100% On-Chain generated GIF-collection on the Ethereum blockchain. If you look at the current on-chain NFT projects, you will notice that most of them use vector images (SVG). We haven't found a single collection that generates on-chain gifs. So here we are. Please check these Medium Posts for more information: medium.com.

Our goal is to develop innovations on the blockchain. CatsOnChain is the first project but not the last. We have more new, innovative ideas that we will implement in the coming months. The COnS owners will receive benefits for these.

Because we are the first ever to create GIFs on-chain, we like to share this knowledge with other projects. For this "consulting" we want to get a certain amount of the NFTs from the new project in return. These NFTs will then be drawn between all CatsOnChain holders. Please contact us via Twitter or Discord, if you want to set up an OnChain Gif project.

about.text: Some important information about the project:
list: 100% On-Chain in just one Smart Contract on the Ethereum Blockchain
Each cat will be randomly generated by the Smart Contract when youmint
You can just mint directly on the smart contract; minting will be implemented on this site in the future

timeline.description: Initial Project Idea. There is no NFT collection with 100% on-chain GIFs yet. We want to be the first.
Build knowledge of how a GIF is constructed at bit level. Unlike other projects, we don't use "human-readable" SVG format but the very common but complex GIF format.
Start of the developments of the smart contract.
Setting up the Discord and Website
Support new projects in setting up on-chain GIF smart contracts. In return, we would like to receive NFTs from the project, which will be distributed among the CatsOnChain owners.
New projects with innovative On Chain ideas. The NFTs can only be minted by CatsOnChain owners.

members.name: pmd
members.description: Hello, my name is PMD. I started the project to create something that has never been done before. I love new and interesting technologies and like to experiment with them.

members.name: kaimbe
members.description: Heyho, I am kaimbe. I am a software developer by trade and passion. I developed this website and supported PMD with reviewing the code of the catsonchain NFT contract.

faqs.question: What makes CatsOnChain different from other OnChain projects?
faqs.answer: CatsOnChain is the first 100% On-Chain generated GIF-collection on the Ethereum blockchain. We compared COnC with other OnChain projects: medium.com.

faqs.question: How can I mint?
faqs.answer: You can only mint via the Smart Contract. Please check this Post for more information: medium.com. Aditionally we are planning on implementing minting on this site in the future.

faqs.question: What are the minting details?
faqs.answer: There is the first Collection with 100% randomly generated On-Chain GIFs. Total mint supply 11 111.

faqs.question: How much will minting be?
faqs.answer: Each CatsOnChain will cost 0.08 ETH plus gas

faqs.question: What chain is this running on?
Where can I find more information?
faqs.answer: Links to social media, opensea, etc are provided in the navigation bar of this web page.
